thread.title: Beyonce In Hiding As Pregnancy Drama Explodes
thread.title_full: Beyonce In Hiding As Pregnancy Drama Explodes

author: James Vituscka
title: Beyonce In Hiding As Pregnancy Drama Explodes
text:
Pregnant Beyonce is in full-on nesting mode, RadarOnline.com has learned, because she’s ballooned so much, she doesn’t want her fans to see!
“She is just not happy about how much weight she’s gained and does not want anyone to see her like this,” a source close to Beyonce and Jay Z told Radar.
“This is why she didn’t want more kids for so long in the first place!”
As Radar previously reported, Beyonce and Jay Z had a tumultuous past year and, at numerous times, were said to be on the brink of divorce .
PHOTOS: BELLY PAINS? Pregnant Beyonce Looks Miserable While Shopping In Beverly Hills 
However, according to the source, the pregnancy has turned that all around for the parents of five-year-old Blue Ivy and – after deciding to put several big projects on hold to focus on Bey’s health – they are stronger than ever!
“This pregnancy has brought Beyonce and Jay Z so much closer together and he is just glowing every time he talks about her,” said the source. “They are both really excited for the twins and these kids will be extremely lucky babies.”
